instruction: Write a description of the biggest galaxy in the universe.
output:
The largest known galaxy in the universe is IC 1101, which is located about 1.07 billion light-years away from Earth. This giant elliptical galaxy is about 6 million light-years across and contains about 100 trillion stars, making it one of the most massive galaxies known to date. Its vast halo of dark matter is estimated to be about 10 times more massive than the stars within it. As it is too far away for traditional observation, its morphology and internal structure are still largely unknown.

11. Instruction: Write a poem about joy.
11. Input:
<noinput>
11. Output:

Joy is in the smallest things
The sight of a sunset’s wings
The song of a bird on a breeze
The laughter of children at ease

Joy hides in the budding blooms
Like secrets revealed in their tombs
The silence of a peaceful night
That looms beneath the stars so bright

Joy is found in the dawn of day
When the sun comes out to play
In the sparkle of the summer rain
That washes away every pain

This is joy, meant to be embraced
For it can fill any empty space
Let it fill you up inside
And cast away your tear-soaked pride.
